## fromHook() function

The function passed to `fromHook` will always be executed when rendering the component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function fromHook<T>(fn: () => T): Ref<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | () =&gt; T | A callback that uses React Hooks to calculate an observed value. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Ref](./reactive.ref.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

## Example


```
const screenSize = fromHook(() => useScreenSize());
effect(() => console.log(screenSize.current));

```
